title: Legend Project
description: The Legend Project is a modern interpretation of luxury living in one of Beverly Hills' most prestigious neighborhoods.
This home features a dramatic central atrium that brings natural light deep into the interior while creating a visual connection between all levels.

floorPlans.caption: Open kitchen with exposed wood beams and island seating
Open-plan living area with vaulted ceiling and piano

gallery.caption: Modern pavilion-style structure with deck and loungers
Contemporary kitchen with wood cabinetry and exposed ceiling beams
Spacious living room with cathedral ceiling and floor-to-ceiling windows
